remarks: A subgroup is unchanged under conjugation by an element of its normalizer.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jan-2015.)
statement:
conjghm.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
conjghm.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
conjghm.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
conjsubg.f $e |- F = ( x e. S |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) $.
conjnmz.1 $e |- N = { y e. X | A. z e. X ( ( y .+ z ) e. S <-> ( z .+ y ) e. S ) } $.
conjnmz $p |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. N ) -> S = ran F ) $.
$d .+ x y z $.
$d .- x y $.
$d A x y z $.
$d F y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d N x $.
$d S x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
